description: WSL-based Linux development environment with essential CLI tools.

script: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y
sudo apt install -y git neovim zsh tmux fzf ripgrep htop curl wget jq nodejs

notes:
Includes:
✅ WSL 2 (Ubuntu) – Linux environment
✅ VS Code Remote – Connect to WSL from VS Code
✅ Git – Version control
✅ Node.js – JavaScript runtime

Restart your WSL terminal after installation. Run `zsh` to start using the new shell.
